ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: There have been times when I have been embarrassed to be a member of my race or races
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I wish I could have more respect for my racial group or racial groups
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel critical about my racial group or racial groups
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Sometimes I have a negative feeling about being a member of my race or races
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: In general, I am ashamed of members of my racial group or racial groups because of the way they act
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When interacting with other members of my race or races, I often feel like I do not fit in
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I do not really identify with my racial group's or racial groups' values and beliefs
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Appropriated Racial Oppression Scale (AROS) - Emotional Responses Subscale
Notes: Sum of 7 items int_ra_1-7; Higher scores indicate higher degrees of internalized racism

ElementDescription: I find persons with lighter skin-tones to be more attractive
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I would like for my children to have light skin
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I find people who have straight and narrow noses to be more attractive
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I prefer my children not to have broad noses
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I wish my nose were straighter
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Good hair (i.e., straight) is better
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Appropriated Racial Oppression Scale (AROS) - American Standard of Beauty Subscale
Notes: Sum of 6 items int_ra_8-13; Higher scores indicate higher degrees of internalized racism

ElementDescription: Because of my race, I feel useless at times
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: I wish I were not a member of my race
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: Whenever I think a lot about being a member of my racial group, I feel depressed
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: Whites are better at a lot of things than people of my race
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: People of my race do not have much to be proud of
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: It is a compliment to be told ''You do not act like a member of your race''
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: When I look in the mirror, sometimes I do not feel good about what I see because of my race
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: I feel that being a member of my racial group is a shortcoming
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -99= Decline to answer

ElementDescription: Appropriated Racial Oppression Scale (AROS) - Devaluation of Own Group Subscale
Notes: Sum of 8 items int_ra_14-21; Higher scores indicate higher degrees of internalized racism

ElementDescription: People of my race should not be so sensitive about race/racial matters
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: People take racial jokes too seriously
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Although discrimination in America is real, it is definitely overplayed by some members of my race
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neutral; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Appropriated Racial Oppression Scale (AROS) - Appropriation of Negative Stereotypes Subscale
Notes: Sum of 3 items int_ra_22-24

ElementDescription: Appropriated Racial Oppression Scale (AROS) - Total Score
Notes: Sum of items int_ra_1-24; Higher scores indicate higher degrees of internalized racism
